welcome_benefits: 750 Delight Points if the first transaction of minimum Rs. 1,500 is made with 30 days of card issuance or 400 Delight Points if the first transaction of minimum Rs, 1,500 is made between 31 and 90 days of card issuance.

Rewards Rate: 3 Delight Points per Rs. 100 spent using the card
Reward Redemption: Delight Points redeemable on the IDBI Delights portal for cashback, merchandise, flight tickets, mobile recharges, hotel reservations, gift cards, movie tickets, etc.
Travel: Delight Points redeemable for flight tickets on the IDBI Delights portal, complimentary domestic airport lounge access, air accident insurance cover worth Rs. 25 lakh.
Domestic Lounge Access: 1 Complimentary domestic airport lounge access every quarter under the Visa domestic lounge program.
Insurance Benefits: Personal air accident cover worth Rs. 25 lakh

fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waived off at all fuel stations across India for transactions between Rs. 500 and Rs. 4,000 (max waiver capped at Rs. 500)
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the transaction amount, subject to a minimum charge of Rs. 500.
